org.owasp.jsptester.conf
Class TagProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.jsptester.conf.TagProperties

public class TagProperties
extends Object

Encapsulates the tag property configuration values for each tag's attributes as well as any necessary prefixes or suffixes to the construction of the JSP tag.

Author:
Jason Li

          Constructs an instance of TagProperties.
